argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | grpeqdivid.1 | |- X = ran G |
| 2 |  | grpeqdivid.2 | |- U = ( GId ` G ) |
| 3 |  | grpeqdivid.3 | |- D = ( /g ` G ) |
| 4 | 1, 3, 2 | #P_grpodivid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( B D B ) = U ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( B D B ) = U ) |
| 6 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( A = B -> ( A D B ) = ( B D B ) ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_eqeq1d | |- ( A = B -> ( ( A D B ) = U <-> ( B D B ) = U ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 7 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A = B -> ( A D B ) = U ) ) |
| 9 |  | #P_oveq1 | |- ( ( A D B ) = U -> ( ( A D B ) G B ) = ( U G B ) ) |
| 10 | 1, 3 | #P_grponpcan | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A D B ) G B ) = A ) |
| 11 | 1, 2 | #P_grpolid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ B e. X ) -> ( U G B ) = B ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_3adant2 | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( U G B ) = B ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( ( A D B ) G B ) = ( U G B ) <-> A = B ) ) |
| 14 | 9, 13 | #P_syl5ib | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( ( A D B ) = U -> A = B ) ) |
| 15 | 8, 14 | #P_impbid | |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X /\ B e. X ) -> ( A = B <-> ( A D B ) = U ) ) |
